title: Add more rich ongoing notification while tracking
message:
Add more rich ongoing notification while tracking

Show an ongoing notification with % journey complete and button to
easily stop tracking.

The arrival notification uses the same notification.

Also:
* Fix BroadcastReceiver leak
* Update start/stop menu item onResume()

title: Set progressbar to 100 onCreate
message:
Set progressbar to 100 onCreate

This is to alert the user its there, once the location kicks in it
nicely resets back to start.

Also make the start 3 to make it more visible even when empty.

title: Set service start/destination from UI
message:
Set service start/destination from UI

Fetch the start and destination points from the MapsActivity and pass
them via Intent to the service.

* Add event bus to easily notify service of destination changes
* Swap current marker and movement of it for built in location tracking
  (blue circle)

title: Update bar based on distance to target
message:
Update bar based on distance to target

Progress bar now reflects distance to target via progress and color.

Also:

* Add start/stop menu item

* Add location tracking to ProgressBarService to update bar based on
  distance to target

title: Initial commit
message:
Initial commit

* Standard activity that does nothing
* MapActivity that zooms to current location
* Service that uses WindowManager to display a floating progress bar
